data: PED GYN Gynecology Day Surgery - Post Operative
Assess as per Anesthetic Care Unit Assessment Standards
Site: Abdominal, Reinforce PRN, Notify Treating Provider if adominal pad is Greater Than or Equal to 50% saturated per hour

Site: Vaginal, Vaginal packing to be left insitu; contact Provider for possible removal before discharge and Notify Treating Provider if menstrual pad is Greater Than or Equal to 50% saturated per hour
Site: Vaginal, Vaginal packing to be left in place through discharge and Notify Treating Provider if menstrual pad is Greater Than or Equal to 50% saturated per hour
Site: Vaginal, Remove vaginal packing as per Provider instructions
Site: Vulva, Document menstrual pad count and Notify Treating Provider if menstrual pad is Greater Than or Equal to 50% saturated per hour
